data.actual_result: It says "1 new message(s) since 1 jan. 2015"
data.expected_result: The banner should say "1 new message(s) since [current timestamp]"
data.short_description: Wrong timestamp on the New Messages banner after receiving a DM from someone you never had DMs with before
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a user who never messaged you before (i.e DM chat history must be empty and channel closed) - Get them to send you a DM
